title: The Workforce Cliff
prompt: A weathered clinic waiting room photographed from a doorway at golden hour, with afternoon light streaming through half-closed blinds across empty vinyl chairs and outdated healthcare pamphlets on a side table; an examination room visible beyond with its door slightly ajar, a stethoscope coiled on the counter, the space carrying the quiet weight of sustained understaffingâ€”shot in documentary style with muted color palette, emphasizing the texture of wear and the absence of human presence, conveying institutional persistence amid structural decline.
